title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Workaround the stutters & pauses
description:
In this how to I will show you how to work around the stutters and pauses currently experienced by a lot of users in MSFS 2020. It is a really frustrating issue which effects the flight experience heavily and sometimes makes the sim completely useless. Using the work around shown in the video I will both show the performance prior to the work around and after.
